title: Knife, ca. 1630
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Leaf-shaped blade, baluster bolster; facetted wooden handle similar to 1985-103-35; piqué with gold, steel and green-stained ivory in form of leafed-shaped motifs, dots, and rozettes. Handle inlaid with rozette at flat end.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1630.
ca. 1630. Horn, gold, mother-of-pearl, steel. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-36.
